content: description this is a cropped cardigan with a plunging v-neckline scalloped trim and buttons down the front the pattern has options for 3/4 or full-length sleeves as well as directions for a non-cropped fit the lightweight cotton-blend yarn makes this a perfect garment for layering the open window stitch pattern means that you will finish this design in no time with inclusive sizing and an easy-to-modify pattern anyone can make this cardigan and look great while wearing it materials ● cascadeyarnssarasotayarn​ weight 3/light-3 5oz 314yd ​size xs​ ~550yards ​sizes​ ~600yards s​ izem​ ~650yards ​sizel ​ ~700 yards ​size xl​ ~750 yards ● size i 5 5mm crochet hook ​and size g 4mm crochet hook ● 2-3half-inch buttons abbreviations ● chain chain ● st stitch ● sl slip ● skip skip ● single_crochet single_crochet ● double_crochet double_crochet ● treble_crochet treble_crochet ● blo back loops only ● chain-1 space chain one space
